ygData.msgSnippet: Organics: Heh, the femme scoffed, Nope, you fight me NOW! The valkyrie lifted Blacknightmar up, and thew her at a rock.  She grabbed her sword and dashed

Organics:
 
"Heh," the femme scoffed,"Nope, you fight me NOW!"
The valkyrie lifted Blacknightmar up, and thew her at a rock.  She grabbed her sword and dashed after the minion.
"First I'll deal with you, then I'll get that other femme!"


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Blacknightmare::

"I have to admit it..."said codly Blacknightmare"so... you're his 
sis... Interesting... Perhaps I should find someone else to fight"

wrote:
> Organics:
>  
> She was suprised, but absorbed the last energy ball.  The femme

>

> > smirking.

> > > Malice was now dep in his internal conflict.  This femme, was

> on? 
> > he thought to himself.  He fell to one knee, holding his head,

> > > "What's happening to me?  Why do I feel like I know her?" he

> > >  
> > > Hellplague was deep in her standoff with Rodimus Prime when 
her 
> > sensors in Malice's body went off.  It was a loud pulse from her

> > > "Damn!  What now?" she cursed.  
> > > Break the stand off with Rodimus or let Malice suffer?  Hard

> > >

> counter

> > > > "Looks like it's you and me," she said, grinning devilishly.
> > > >

square

> > > with Blacknightmare.

said, 
> > > tightening the grip on her sword.
> > > >  
> > > > Wolfblade ducked under the larger bots in her way and made 
her 
> > way 
> > > to the cannon.  The she saw two bots trying to tear it up.  
She 
> > > fired a shot close to one, and both stopped what hey were 
doing 
> > and 
> > > stepped into full view.  
> > > >  
> > > > It was Malice, and a bot who looked a whole lot like him.  
> > > Wolfblade lowered her rifle, she only stared at Malice, who 
did 
> > > nothing.  
> > > > "Malice..." the femme said taking a step toward him.
> > > > Malice said nothing, he did not recognize this litle femme, 
> why 
> > > did she look at him like that.  
> > > > "Do I know you, miss?" The Hunter Killer asked, flexing his 
> > claws.
> > > > "Malice, don't you recognize me?  It's me, Wolfblade.  Come 
> on, 
> > > quit messing around, let's go back to base, we'll fix whatever 
> > they 
> > > did to you.  Comeback with me," the femme said, extending a 
hand 
> > out 
> > > to Malice.
> > > > Injustice began to crack up.  This was absurd, Malice was a 
> > > Minion, right?
> > > > "Go play somewhere else, little gil, we'e busy," the clone 
> said, 
> > > smirking.

> > Wolfblade 
> > > snapped, loud enough for anyone to hear.
> > > > Malice, meanwhile, was secretly deep in his own conflict.  
Who 
> > was 
> > > she really?  she semed like she knew him very well, and 
somehow, 
> > she 
> > > seemed familiar somehow, but he knew he hadn't seen her before.
> > > >  
> > > > Did he?

that

> with

exclaimed,

> > > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: You all know what is at stake here. 
Our 
> > > > > > possibility 
> > > > > > > for survival. This cannon may be our only defense 
> against 
> > > the

> > > > > > > bringer, Unicron. We cannot aford to lose it. I'm sure

battle

> > > of 
> > > > us

> > > you 
> > > > and 
> > > > > > > notice how importent this moment will be in 
Cybertronian 
> > > > history. 
> > > > > > On 
> > > > > > > this ground Autobots, Maximals, Decepticons, Predacons 
> and 
> > > > > > > Tripredacus are all united for the first time in one 
> comon 
> > > > > effort. 
> > > > > > > We do not fight to destroy each other but to insure 
all 
> of 
> > > our 
> > > > > > > survival. Autobots, Decepticons and otherwise, these 
are 
> > > mere 
> > > > > > terms.

> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Prime draws his weapons as do the others. The 
ultimate 
> > > battle 
> > > > > is 
> > > > > > > coming. A battle of all Transformers.
